rules_text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player’s upkeep, that player exiles two cards from their graveyard. If they can’t, they lose 2 life.
notes:
2k17
Cost: 2B > 1B

fluffy: During —> At the beginning of, chooses two cards from their graveyard and exiles them —> exiles two cards from their graveyard (redundant wording)
